column1: Friends may visit with the Free family on Monday
column3: 2015 from 6 p.m. until time of the funeral service at 8 p.m. in the chapel of Jones & Son Funeral Home with Bro. Donnie Chambers and Talon Free officiating.  Graveside service will be on Tuesday
column5: 2015 at 12 p.m. in the Cooper Memorial Cemetery with full military honors provided by American Legion Post #136 of Oneida.
